name: In the Night (AIE Seattle)
description: An adventure stealth game where you plan the heist of the century in 1920's New York. You play as spunky young thief, Oliver “Silver” Fox,  who by day gathers information about Marquis Museum of History, and by night goes and steals the museum's most valuable artifact. Using his skills of investigation, conversation, and stealth, Fox will stop at nothing to get what wants.
